templateVariablesDescription.productSeoIsInheritedMetaTitle: Meta title of the product was inherited [if example] (productSeo.isInheritedMetaTitle)
templateVariablesDescription.productSeoIsInheritedMetaDescription: Meta description of the product was inherited [if example] (productSeo.isInheritedMetaDescription)
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryId: Id the main category of the product (mainCategory.id) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryTranslatedName: Name of the main category of the product (mainCategory.translated.name) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryTranslatedDescription: Description of the main category of the product (mainCategory.translated.description) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryTranslatedBreadcrumb: Breadcrumb the main category of the product (mainCategory.translated.breadcrumb) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryType: Category type of the main category of the product (mainCategory.type) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategoryExternalLink: External link of the main category of the product (mainCategory.externalLink) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoMetaTitle: Meta title of the main category of the product [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoMetaDescription: Meta description of the main category of the product [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoUrl: Url of the main category of the product [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoIsInheritedMetaTitle: Meta title of the main category of the product was inherited [if example] (mainCategorySeo.isInheritedMetaTitle) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoIsInheritedMetaDescriptio: Meta description of the main category of the product was inherited [if example] (mainCategorySeo.isInheritedMetaDescription) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.mainCategorySeoIsInheritedUrl: Product main category URL inherited [if example] (mainCategorySeo.isInheritedUrl) [Can only be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.languageLocaleCode: Country code of the language for which the template is generated (language.locale[↯].code)
templateVariablesDescription.liveShopName: Live template for the output of shop names [Cannot be used with URL templates]
templateVariablesDescription.liveProductPrice: Live template for issuing the item price [Cannot be used with URL templates]

metaTitle.productNameAndVariantOptions: Product name [+ variant options for variants]
metaTitle.productNameShippingFreePriceAndShopName: Product name + (free shipping) + for only X Euro + from shop name [live template]
metaTitle.productNameManufacturePriceAndShopName: Product name + from manufacturer + for only X Euro + from shop name [live template]
metaTitle.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name

metaDescription.productNameShippingFreePriceAndShopName: Product name + (free shipping) + for only X Euro + from shop name [live template]
metaDescription.productNameManufacturePriceAndShopName: Product name + from manufacturer + for only X Euro + from shop name [live template]
metaDescription.productNameMAndProperties: Product name + output of the product properties
metaDescription.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name

url.productName: Product name [+ product number for variants]
url.productNameAndVariantOptions: Product name [+ variant options for variants]
url.manufacturerAndProductName: Manufacturer's name + product name [+ product number for variants]
url.metaTitleOrProductNameAsFallback: Meta title if available, otherwise product name [+ product number for variants]
url.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name [+ product number for variants]
url.parentCategoryUrlAndProductName: URL of the parent category + product name [+ product number for variants]
url.introTextAndProductName: "our-topseller /" + product name [+ product number for variants]

robotsTag.GrossPriceLessThanFive: If the base gross price is less than 5 dollars (or euros etc.) noindex, follow, otherwise index, follow
robotsTag.indexNofollow: index,nofollow (index page and do not track links)
robotsTag.noindexFollow: noindex,follow (do not index page and follow links)
robotsTag.noindexNofollow: noindex,nofollow (do not index page and do not follow links)

facebookTitle.metaTitleOrProductName: Meta title if available, otherwise product name
facebookTitle.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name

facebookDescription.metaDescriptionOrProductName: Meta description if available, otherwise product description shortened to 65 characters
facebookDescription.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name

twitterTitle.metaTitleOrProductName: Meta title if available, otherwise product name
twitterTitle.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name

twitterDescription.metaDescriptionOrProductName: Meta description if available, otherwise product description shortened to 110 characters
twitterDescription.customFieldOrProductNameAsFallback: Own additional field if available, otherwise product name
